# [Interview #1078: Steelheart Signing Report - Shardlet, Entry #1](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1078#1)

#### Question

Is Szeth's sword noticeably smaller than other shardblades?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes.
